showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Regional trucker (home weekly), and this TA is a great place to take a break. Nice clean, convenient shower facilities, and all the little nicknacks you usually need to grab during your downtime. The staff is friendly and courteous as well.
Nice Big Quiet But Only A Few Good Maintenance Personnel. So Shower's Can Be Slow/Backed Up Certain Times. They Have Security

If you are a professional driver and you are looking for a hot shower after a long day don't expect one at this TA, just like 90% of their facilities low water pressure and lukewarm water with fluctuations in temperature.

I took a shower at this location and I had a good experience and was pretty clean white guy with white shirt keeps floor and showers/restrooms pretty clean and does an awesome job also his willing to help you if you don‚Äôt know how to type ‚Ä¶

So me and my husband come in to shower before we head out well my husband accidentally left his wallet in the shower room well we noticed it missing after we left I called and they said they have it we go back to get it just to find out ‚Ä¶

Good Shower, water pressure reminded me of Rambo in the Jail clean up scene.
" Will said Clean him up, so clean him up, don't forget to get him behind the ears...ha ha ha ha ha..."
Family Friendly People
oxox

All is great from the service tech Andrew to Elise the waitress and the counter and shower girls. Andrew took care of my truck issue's in a timely manner and listened to my concerns. He did a job well done. Elise was very friendly and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ clean and free of the plastic yellow land mines. Restrooms were clean and didn't have that dirty driver smell like so many do. Shower # 5 was clean with plenty of hot water that never ran out. Shower #7 was clean too with the same quality ‚Ä¶

Good place.. I have running dedicated around this area for a month and never a wait for shower. Clean and restaurant is always ready to serve. Drop trailers can be irritating to some but the area dictates how the stop is used.  No ‚Ä¶

Mostly ok... Only complaint I have is for the high price of a shower I'd think I could have had clean towels to dry off with. Mine was full of someone's hair knotted in it. Bathroom was mostly clean but could improve.

showerReviews.reviewText: Have to agree with everyone else. Maintenance and cleanliness in the showers are lacking. Normal area seemed to be clean but they need a deeper clean for sure. See photos. Shower heads leak like crazy, fan, and exhaust fan caked in massive ‚Ä¶

First shower on the right, number 12, needs a good scrubbing. Pretty disgusting. I watched a cleaner wipe the wet shower walls down with a towel and walk right out. He didn't spray any disinfectant, just didn't clean it at all basically. Th ‚Ä¶
The reviews weren‚Äôt wrong. I left the TA down the street and came here for a shower. While I wasn‚Äôt disappointed with the water pressure, the overall cleanliness left a lot to be desired. ‚Ä¶

Showers where clean‚Ä¶. Not a lot of water pressure‚Ä¶ Golden Corral was good.. but the parking situation is the problem here‚Ä¶. U got drop trailers u got trucks that‚Äôs been taking up spots so long they have rusted!! For sure nobody checking lot ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ women's restroom was positively disgusting!  It smells like a port-a-potty that's been sitting for a while. There's no way in hell I'll shower here!  I parked and had to literally walk my dog from one end of the parking lot to the other ‚Ä¶

Very poor service provided by staff members. Shower needs some attention. Drain had no screws in it, I discovered this showing when it popped up and like to cut my foot on it. Fan needs to be cleaned.

‚Ä¶ hand washing sink near the coffee area didn't have any soap. I decided to hold off on taking a shower because if the whole store is this dirty, I doubt they clean the showers. I gave 2 stars because the employees were nice & the parking ‚Ä¶

I'm here every week, never a clean bathroom. If you come in at night don't expect to be able to get a shower because they are always closed until morning shift comes in. Good luck with parking, it is a disaster of a parking lot since about ‚Ä¶

Shower was clean, bathrooms could a been a little better, but of course it was very busy at the time too with people everywhere. Tight parking, but a lot of parking, so that's good. And I really like that it had a Golden Corral inside! The ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ needs to be cleaned! From the Golden Corral (kitchen definitely and dining room - maybe they're understaffed on servers), to the restrooms, showers could be cleaned more thoroughly, and the parking lot. I would rather wait longer ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Not the cleanest if your in the shower to long they will beat on the door and shut down the water. If you say anything about it the guy will not respond. Great service lol

Hey guys, I had to get some fuel and took a shower here really great place. I really appreciate these guys fishing VR. The showers are smaller than usual but hell look we're on the East Coast who cares Jim I saw originally in the store he ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ during the day. They always have hot dogs available. Only down side is the small size; approx. 8 legit parking spaces and a couple of showers. Can never get a shower because there's no where inconspicuous to park. I'd still rather stop ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the ground everywhere there are flies flying around there is trash everywhere. The showers are filthy, filthy, dirty I went into get a shower in the last president was there. His face cloth and towel was still there. The mirror hadn‚Äôt been ‚Ä¶
Employees were courteous and happy, the shower was clean, the bathroom was clean, a small Travel Center but w a big heart! Thank you!

Came in to get a shower and while waiting noticed nobody was in the showers and I was sure they where already cleaned. After waiting another 12 min went to the counter to ask about my shower and to found out I was only waiting because the ‚Ä¶
Stopped in for a shower, staff was friendly and helpful, shower room was clean. Only complaint would be the water pressure kept changing. That's the reason for one missing ‚≠êÔ∏è

I showered this morning at 5:30am. Didn't catch the shower porter's name but it started with an R. Professional as could be. Walked me to the back for an extra towel and then to my very clean, nice, shower....without being creepy at all ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ n a nap was surprised by the service very nice although the subway had not opened up yet so I toke advantage of the shower and I was very satisfied was not what I was expecting and by the time was done got my food only thing was parking ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ showers 45% out of 100% ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ stopping in this Plaza just under 1 yr now. I intentionally avoid buying fuel here or spending any money in the store because of my disappointments. .... 1 st problem no showers. Then they installed showers and no matter how much fuel ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I am living so close :) Wish to have place like that somewhere further.  Tasty food,  interesting stock,  prices of course not a Wallmart but affordable . Year after year they going better and better.  One minus is shower policy
Quick stop for a shower üöø... Cheaper than the major truck stops... Got the job done ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Spent the night and decided to get a shower. $13 well spent. Modern, roomy and clean. Had.the same tile in the shower stall l have at home. I loved the dual shower heads with the rainfall shower head above you! Felt like home. No soap ‚Ä¶

I purchased 117 gallons of fuel and wanted a shower, but was told I had to pay $13.00 because they are an independent truck stop. I don't fuel anywhere but independent truck stops, and with few exceptions they give you a free shower. I know ‚Ä¶

I've been coming here for years. I'm sure glad to have a shower. Just wish it was not cold. The restaurant is now under staffed. Poor service and undercooked food. Because of management. Again under staffed! Not  poor staff.

This is my 19th year driving and this was the absolute worst shower experience I've ever had, literally. The shower room like walking in to a sauna at around 105 degrees, no towels, no soap, and I still had to pay 10 dollars after ‚Ä¶
It has good food, good quality and good price fuel but they should give free shower after 75 gallons instead 150. People there are very nice.
Showers are big and clean but there's no a/c inside showers and the fan doesn't help with the hot inside, I can't even imagine if I take a shower with hot water, I'll pass out...
